title: Black screen after hitting launch
body:
This only ever started to happen when I use teamspeak. Up until then it worked perfectly. Even with teamspeak off and restarting the computer, the problem still lingers. I reinstalled and it worked for one play session but when I reopened the game the problem came back. My drivers are up to date and i've tried repairing the problem but nothing seems to help. 

Any thoughts?

replies.body:
Black screens in the client are almost entirely caused by problems with your connection reaching out servers properly. I recommend working through the steps outlined in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a start.

Let me know how those steps affected your issue.
